entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Rockglen
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:16 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rockglen 04:00 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: -7.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 89 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023
